text: Hendrik de Iongh (4 August 1877 - 9 August 1962) was a Dutch fencer. He won a bronze medal in the team sabre event at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1877 births Category:1962 deaths Category:Dutch male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of the Netherlands Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Netherlands Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Sportspeople from Dordrecht Category:Medalists at the 1912 Summer Olympics
title: Hendrik de Iongh
